AvoidUsingHardCodedIP.description:
Description

Application with hard-coded IP addresses can become impossible to deploy in some cases.
Externalizing IP addresses is preferable.

Example(s):

Use this rule with the default properties by just referencing it:

Use this rule and customize it:
AvoidUsingHardCodedIP.option:
Name	Default Value	Description
checkAddressTypes	ipv4 , ipv6 , ipv4MappedIpv6	Check for IP address types.Zero or more of:ipv4MappedIpv6,ipv4,ipv6
